channel.title: Julia on Cleyton Farias
channel.description: Recent content in Julia on Cleyton Farias

item.title: Using Julia for Data Science
item.description: This a quick introduction to the Julia programming language and will be presented to you how you can work rightaway with datasets with Julia. Why Julia? Julia is a high level programming language released in 2012 by a team of MIT researchers. Since its beginning, the aim was to solve the so called two-language programing problem: easy to use functionalities of interpretable languages (Python, R, Matlab) vs high performance of compiled languages (C, C++, Fortran).
